dao.name: QRY_HFD_LIVE_COD_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, live_cod, live_nam, live_sna, contry_cod, view_seq, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hfd_livecod_rf where athena_id = ?

dao.name: QRY_SEL_HFD_LIVE_COD_RF
dao.statement: SELECT HFD_LIVECOD_RF.LIVE_COD, HFD_LIVECOD_RF.LIVE_NAM, HFD_LIVECOD_RF.LIVE_SNA, CNTRY_RF.CONTRY_NAM, HFD_LIVECOD_RF.LIVE_COD || ':' || HFD_LIVECOD_RF.LIVE_NAM LIVE_DISPLAY FROM HFD_LIVECOD_RF, CNTRY_RF WHERE HFD_LIVECOD_RF.ATHENA_ID = CNTRY_RF.ATHENA_ID AND HFD_LIVECOD_RF.CONTRY_COD = CNTRY_RF.CONTRY_COD AND HFD_LIVECOD_RF.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id ORDER BY HFD_LIVECOD_RF.VIEW_SEQ, HFD_LIVECOD_RF.LIVE_COD
